Package com.example.appify.Fragments

Class EditEventDialogFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
com.example.appify.Fragments.EditEventDialogFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class EditEventDialogFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
Fragment dialog for editing an event, allowing users to modify event details. This fragment performs input validation and uploads images to Firebase Storage.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    EditEventDialogFragment.EditEventDialogListener
    Interface for communicating the edited event details to the parent activity.

    • onAttach

      public void onAttach(@NonNull android.content.Context context)
      Attaches the fragment to the parent activity and verifies that the parent implements the EditEventDialogListener callback interface.
      Overrides:
      onAttach in class androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
      Parameters:
      context - The context to which the fragment is attached.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if the parent context does not implement EditEventDialogListener.

    • validateInputs

      private boolean validateInputs(android.widget.EditText eventName, android.widget.EditText eventDate, android.widget.EditText eventFacility, android.widget.EditText eventRegistrationEndDate, android.widget.EditText maxWaitEntrant, android.widget.EditText maxSampleEntrant)
      Validates input fields to ensure they meet required formats and values.
      Parameters:
      eventName - Event name field.
      eventDate - Event date field.
      eventFacility - Facility field.
      eventRegistrationEndDate - Registration end date field.
      maxWaitEntrant - Maximum waitlist entrants field.
      maxSampleEntrant - Maximum sample entrants field.
      Returns:
      True if inputs are valid, otherwise false.

    • isRegistrationEndDateBeforeEventDate

      private boolean isRegistrationEndDateBeforeEventDate(String eventDateStr, String registrationEndDateStr)
      Checks if the registration end date is before the event date.
      Parameters:
      eventDateStr - The event date as a string in "MMM dd, yyyy" format.
      registrationEndDateStr - The registration end date as a string in "MMM dd, yyyy" format.
      Returns:
      True if the registration end date is before the event date, otherwise false.
